name: Chasing Tales: Baverne the Hunter
requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood rifle and perform tasks to re-create Baverne's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Baverne the Hunter.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Baverne: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Baverne: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Baverne: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Baverne at a heroic font.
